#!/usr/bin/env ruby
$tags = [ { :label => "TODO", :color => "#A00000", :regexp => /TODO[\s,:]+(\w.*)$/i }, { :label => "FIXME", :color => "#CF830D", :regexp => /FIX ?ME[\s,:]+(\w.*)$/i }, { :label => "CHANGED", :color => "#008000", :regexp => /CHANGED[\s,:]+(\w.*)$/ }, ]
require "#{ENV['TM_SUPPORT_PATH']}/lib/textmate" require "erb" include ERB::Util
def TextMate.file_link (file, line = 0) return "txmt://open/?url=file://" + file.gsub(/[^a-zA-Z0-9.-\/]/) { |m| sprintf("%%%02X", m[0]) } + "&line=" + line.to_s end
# setup empty array for per tag results $tags.each { |tag| tag[:matches] = [ ] }
TextMate.each_text_file do |file| $tags.each do |tag| File.open(file) do |io| io.grep(tag[:regexp]) do |content| tag[:matches] << { :file => file, :line => io.lineno, :content => content, :match => $1, } end end end end
tmpl_file = "#{ENV['TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT']}/template.rhtml" puts ERB.new(File.open(tmpl_file), 0, '<>').result
